content: तुमुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Tumultuous, noisy; <ls>Māl. 9. 3</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 13</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 1.">19.</ls> {@--2@} Fierce, raging; <ls>R. 3. 57.</ls> {@--3@} Excited. {@--4@} Perplexed, confused; <ls>R. 5. 49.</ls> --लः --लं {@--1@} An uproar, a tumult, clang. {@--2@} A confused combat, melée.
